attributes.action: Give under 18s the vote in a society we live in, so we are represented
attributes.background: I am constantly told that I can't have a say in political decisions (by being denied the vote) just because I'm 'too young  to understand'.  I, along with many others I know, feel unrepresented in this society of which I am still a citizen. As a citizen, I deserve the same rights as others

rejection.details: It's not clear what you would like the minimum voting age in the UK to be.
